00012 #define DDEBUG(name) std::cout << __FILE__ <<","<<__LINE__ << "; " << #name<<": " << name << std::endl;
00013 #define IDEBUG(name) std::cout << __FILE__ <<","<<__LINE__ << "; " << #name <<" at " << &name << std::endl;

00015 #define INVALIDF (-FLT_MAX)
00016 #define INVALIDI INT_MIN
00017 
00018 namespace marlin
00019 {
00020   void EventPropertiesWriteEngine::registerParameters()
00021   {
00022     // use reconstructed particles as input
00023     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterInputCollection(LCIO::RECONSTRUCTEDPARTICLE,_engineName+"_InCol",
00024                                                 "Name of ReconstructedParticle collection",
00025                                                 _recPartColName, std::string("Unset")  );
00026 
00027   }
00028 
00029   void EventPropertiesWriteEngine::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00030   {
00031     hostTree->Branch("eventKin", &_eventKin ,"sumE/D:sumP[3]/D:sqrtS/D" );
00032 
00033   }
00034 
00035 
00036   void EventPropertiesWriteEngine::fillVariables( EVENT::LCEvent* evt ) 
00037   {
00038     
00039     LCCollection* inCol;
00040     try
00041       {
00042         inCol = evt->getCollection( _recPartColName );
00043 
00044         _eventKin.sumE    = 0;
00045         _eventKin.sumP[0] = 0;
00046         _eventKin.sumP[1] = 0;
00047         _eventKin.sumP[2] = 0;
00048 //      _eventKin.sqrtS   = 0;
00049 
00050         typedef LCTypedVector< ReconstructedParticle > LCTypedVecRP;
00051         typedef LCTypedVecRP::iterator RPIter;
00052         LCTypedVecRP parts( inCol );
00053         for ( RPIter rpIt = parts.begin(); rpIt != parts.end(); ++rpIt )
00054           {
00055             const double* mom = (*rpIt)->getMomentum();
00056             
00057             _eventKin.sumP[0] += mom[0];
00058             _eventKin.sumP[1] += mom[1];
00059             _eventKin.sumP[2] += mom[2];
00060 
00061             _eventKin.sumE += (*rpIt)->getEnergy();
00062           }
00063 
00064         
00065         double magP2 = _eventKin.sumP[0] * _eventKin.sumP[0] 
00066           /*      */ + _eventKin.sumP[1] * _eventKin.sumP[1] 
00067           /*      */ + _eventKin.sumP[2] * _eventKin.sumP[2];
00068 
00069         _eventKin.sqrtS = sqrt( _eventKin.sumE *  _eventKin.sumE - magP2 );
00070 
00071       }// try
00072     catch ( DataNotAvailableException err )
00073       {
00074         cout <<  "WARNING: Collection "<< _recPartColName
00075              << " not available in event "<< evt->getEventNumber() << endl;
00076 
00077         _eventKin.sumE    = INVALIDF;
00078         _eventKin.sumP[0] = INVALIDF;
00079         _eventKin.sumP[1] = INVALIDF;
00080         _eventKin.sumP[2] = INVALIDF;
00081         _eventKin.sqrtS   = INVALIDF;
00082         
00083       }// catch
00084 
00085     
00086   }
00087 
00088 }//namespace marlin
